      • chooseSafestMove

        public static scotlandyard.Move chooseSafestMove(java.util.List<AINode> states,
                                                 double best)
        Take the best score and the list of possible states and returns the associated move of the best state. If more than one best states are found, the score is calculated again on the chosen best states.
        Parameters:
        states -
        best -
        Returns:
        the best move

      • detectiveFilter

        public static java.util.Set<scotlandyard.Move> detectiveFilter(java.util.Set<scotlandyard.Move> unfiltered,
                                                               AbstractGameState state)
        Detective filter only used for MrX's AI that assumes that the detective know MrX's location and selects the first two moves which take him closer to MrX.
        Parameters:
        unfiltered -
        state -
        Returns:

      • mrXFilter

        public static java.util.Set<scotlandyard.Move> mrXFilter(java.util.Set<scotlandyard.Move> unfiltered,
                                                         AbstractGameState state)
        Filters unnecessary moves for MrX. The rules are: - No secret moves on a round that MrX is going to show up - No secret moves when all the options are taxi moves. - No secret move during the first two rounds - If on boat node, always use secret moves if secret tickets are available - Can use double moves ONLY when there are two or more detectives within two or less moves away
        Parameters:
        unfiltered -
        state -
        Returns:
        New set of moves
